chat_history.message: Hello, my iPhone 12 Pro has the above problem: My package should be delivered on May 22nd but as of today, May 24th, still nothing. What's the issue? Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile

the package has been returned to sender.

Please send it to this address when you receive it:

Fatim Diarra
Moritzstraße 12, 
13597 Berlin

Regards,
Claudia from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We take note of the customer's request. We will inform our logistics partner about the reshipment.

Regards,
JY

Hello,

Did you receive it?

https://www.ups.com/track?loc=de_DE&tracknum=1ZBF15606888756570&requester=ST/trackdetails

It shows, that you have received it.

Please send us a new TN.

Regards,
Aysah, Back Market

Dear Backcare,

We confirm the reception of the device. We have arranged a reshipment of the parcel and will provide the tracking number soon. Thank you for your patience.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

Here is the TN: 1ZBF1560D901162471

Please send us the recipient name as the company/recipient name is incorrect and the courier is facing delivery issues.

Regards,
RK

Hello ecomobile,

The correct Address:

back & more moritzstraße 12 berlin spandau

Regards,
Aysah, Back market

Dear Backcare,

Thank you for the updated address.

Regards,
RK
